Q1.question: Did you vote in the Petaling Jaya Parliament?

Q2.question: Do you agree with the cancellation of the PJD Link?

Q3.question: Even though the PJD Link project has been cancelled, do you think it will still be implemented in the future?

Q4.question: Do you agree with the use of nuclear energy in Malaysia to achieve a net zero carbon target?

Q5.question: Among the following parties, which one do you feel most positive about?

Q6.question: When was the last time you heard or saw news about your Member of Parliament or their machinery?

Q7.question: In your opinion, what is the most important role of a Member of Parliament?

answers.FlowNo_8=1: To be active in the local community
answers.FlowNo_8=2: To bring development and investment to the local area
answers.FlowNo_8=3: To follow and support their party's directions
